Reviews.Title: Amazing shipping time
Reviews.Author: Robert McPherson "rlmack"
Reviews.Content: The cable was exactly the one we needed to complete the installation of our camera system & it was here at the right time.

Reviews.Title: Absolute quality!
Reviews.Author: frogface
Reviews.Content: Was very impressed with the quality of this product!  It is durable and easy to install.  It's the best!  Awesome!

ProductInfo.Features:
Tight locking, secure & can't accidently disconnect
Easy to connect co-ax extension cable
75 ohm, double shielded & weather resistant to withstand harsh conditions
Send power to your camera via this cable
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SWADS-30MBNC-GL Video and Power 100-Feet BNC Cable (White)
